content.question: Which of the following best explains the error, if any, in this code segment?

choices.label: There is no error in the code segment as it correctly identifies â€œActiveâ€ step counts.
The condition should be if (steps >= 10000 && steps <= 15000) to properly include 10,000 and 15,000.
The condition should be if (steps > 10000 || steps < 15000) to include the correct range of step counts.
The condition should be if (steps >= 10000 || steps <= 15000) to include all step counts from 10,000 and above, as well as 15,000 and below.

content.answer: The condition should be if (steps >= 10000 && steps <= 15000) to properly include 10,000 and 15,000.

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
